name: ColorMartix by Flavio J.A Silva
description:
For the Game Jam "ColorChangesEverything"

You are a test subject testing a new martix gun that change the state of certain objects depending on its mode. Your goal is to get past the test rooms and use the lift at the end to escape.

Controls

WASD - MOVEMENT
SPACE - JUMP
MOSUE - LOOK AROUND
1-5 : CHANGE COLOR MODE
E - PICKUP & DROP
LEFT MOUSE - FIRE

Color Mode 1 Growth (Make things big)

Color Mode 2 Shrink (Make things smol)

Color Mode 3 Hover (Make things float/hover)

Color Mode 4 Thunder (Make things go flying)

Color Mode 5 Natural (Make things revert to normal)

GameMaker: Flavio J.A Silva (a.k.a Perry12)
